item.title: Actors are reference types, but why classes?
item.description: The recently announced Swift Concurrency Roadmap includes the proposal of an Actor reference type, similar to a class type. In this whitepaper, Chris Lattner explores the behavior and requirements of actors and proposes that Actor types be modeled as a new kind of nominal reference type in Swift.
